item.title: Raichur DC recommends suspension of senior scientist over inaction on mining plaint
item.description: <![CDATA[Raichur: Deputy commissioner (DC) Nitish Kumar recommended suspension of Pushpalatha , a senior scientist of the mines and geology department, for her negligence and irresponsibility in preventing illegal stone mining in Manvi and illegal sand mining in Tungabhadra River.The DC mentioned that serious allegations were made that Pushpalatha abetted the illegality by not taking action despite a complaint being filed against Akbar Pasha, the owner of Hindustan Stone Crusher Private Limited, who was ...]]>
item.author: Tnn
